entities.name: magorian
entities.description: Magorian is introduced as a chestnut-bodied centaur who is walking towards Harry and Umbridge with his bow raised. He asks Umbridge who she is.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is introduced as the Senior Undersecretary to the Minister of Magic and Head-mistress and High Inquisitor of Hogwarts. She is described as whimpering and trembling with her wand pointed at Magorian.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as looking left towards Magorian.

relationships.description: Magorian and the other centaurs are described as being ready to attack Umbridge, but they do not actually attack her.
Umbridge is described as being targeted by Magorian and the other centaurs.
